page.title: 15Ashcott-Community(Continued)
page.content: It is a pretty place and there is easy access to many towns and well known areas.One aspect of the{village}which everyone hates,however,is the A39 which runs directly through Ashcott.It is dangerous,the speed limit is seldom heeded,and the{traffic}is noisy,dirty, smelly,and much too frequent and heavy for the small road.Though the {inhabitants,}many of whom were born there are very happy,they are petrified of the road and want it to go. The{government}are cosidering building a by-pass.
